name: Leteora
description:
A short atmospheric puzzle-game about an intergalactic escape from a starcruiser.  After you exit the hyperspace you find yourself in a giant space battle. Your ship gets shot. After you crashed into the hangar of an intergalactic cruiser.  Only one ship remains to leave the cruiser but to loose its anchorage you have to get to the control terminal.

It is a solo project for my 4th semester at the htk academy Hamburg. It is made with Blender, Substance Designer, FMOD, Reaper and Unreal Engine 5. 

Sounds are from WeLoveIndies.
